welcome_message_body: Welcome to Lauderhill! Get ready to experience the charm of our vibrant city, known for its diverse culture, beautiful parks, and delicious cuisine. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Lauderhill has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Fort Lauderdale Executive Airport serves as the primary hub for commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is dedicated to private aviation, providing services and amenities for private jet owners and passengers.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pompano Beach Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Pompano Beach Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at North Perry Airport serves as the primary hub for commercial flights and features a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at North Perry Airport caters to private and chartered flights, offering a luxurious and exclusive experience for passengers.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, free of charge. Network name and password can be obtained at the information desk.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Opa Locka Airport serves as the primary hub for commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Opa Locka Airport is used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal of Dade Collier Airport, where all commercial flights and services are located.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal of Dade Collier Airport, used for shipping and receiving of goods and packages.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
